descript.abstract: This line data layer contains information regarding location of and attributes regarding the streets, roads, highways, and interstates within Champaign County.
descript.purpose: This data layer is intended to convey the locations of paved road segments, and information about the segments including street name, alternate names, address range, speed limit, one-way restrictions, and other information. The street centerlines will be applicable for routing, address matching, map production, and other uses.

idinfo.useconst: The data files are provided "as is". There is no guarantee or warranty concerning the accuracy of information contained in the data. No warranty is made, either expressed or implied, as to any other matter whatsoever, including, without limitation, the condition of the product, or its fitness for any particular purpose. The burden for determining fitness for use lies entirely with the user. Reproduction or redistribution of the data or products derived there from outside licensee's organization or entity is expressly forbidden. The data shall only be used on the specified project for the unit of local government. Consultants may not further reproduce or redistribute the data beyond the scope of the specified project. Upon project completion all files containing any source data or products derived there from shall be returned to the Licensor, all copies of CCGIS data installed on all computers shall be removed, and all backup copies shall be destroyed. None of the data shall be electronically duplicated by any means for use by others, in whole or in part, without express written permission of the CCGIS. Resale of the data is prohibited.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.5.1.7333

mapproj.mapprojn: NAD 1983 StatePlane Illinois East FIPS 1201 Feet

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

overview.eaover:
Notes: A field to differentiate types of streets for cartographic purposes. Type of Street (Value) Interstate Lanes (A) Interstate Ramps (B) Federal Routes (C) State Routes (D) County Highways (E) Roads Major (F) Roads Minor (G) Private Roads (H) Outside County (I) Alley (J) Other (K) Don't Display (X)
There is a short segment of E University Ave in Urbana between University and High Cross Rd that is tagged as "DC" since it's both a state and federal route. I tagged any street segment outside Champaign County as "I" instead of the type it exists as.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
